title: The Phinney Phantom
description: Strange clues have begun appearing around Phinney Ridge, and the Neighborhood Investigations Bureau needs fresh eyes. Follow the Phantom’s trail, uncover the secrets hidden in plain sight, and find out what message they’re trying to send.

locations.name: Phinney Center
locations.narrative_snippet:
Strange things have been happening in **Phinney Ridge**.

For weeks, residents have been finding mysterious puzzles scattered throughout the neighborhood. No one knows who's leaving them or why.

---PAGE---

This morning, you found an envelope slipped under your door. Inside was a single piece of paper with a message:

{{handwritten:scrawl}}If you're clever enough to solve my riddles, start at the zoo gates. The first clue awaits where wild things dream.{{/handwritten}}

---PAGE---

Intrigued, you head to the historic gates of Woodland Park Zoo. Who is this mysterious puzzle-maker? What do they want?

Only one way to find out — *follow the clues*.
